body.data:
INSERT INTO PCLANC (
    RECNUM,
    DTLANC,
    CODCONTA,
    CODFORNEC,
    HISTORICO,
    NUMNOTA,
    DUPLIC,
    VALOR,
    DTVENC,
    CODFILIAL,
    INDICE,
    NUMBANCO,
    DESCONTOFIN,
    TXPERM,
    TIPOLANC,
    DTEMISSAO,
    TIPOPARCEIRO,
    NOMEFUNC,
    TIPOPAGTO,
    NUMCCDESTDOC,
    CODFORNECPRINC,
    HISTORICO2,
    MOEDA,
    CODCOMPRADOR,
    NFSERVICO,
    DTULTALTER,
    CODFUNCULTALTER,
    VLVARIACAOCAMBIAL,
    AGENDAMENTO,
    CODROTINACAD,
    CODROTINAALT,
    FORMAPGTO,
    PARCELA,
    FORNECEDOR,
    VLRUTILIZADOADIANTFORNEC,
    TIPOAUTORIZACAO,
    CODROTINAVERSAOCAD,
    CODROTINAVERSAOALT,
    TIPOSERVICO,
    UTILIZOURATEIOCONTA,
    PRCRATEIOUTILIZADO,
    REINFEVENTOR4040,
    DTHRLANC,
	  HISTORICOREJEICAOSUPLORC
) VALUES (
    (SELECT NVL(MAX(RECNUM), 0) + 1 FROM PCLANC),
    TRUNC(TO_DATE(SUBSTR('{{DatePicker1.selectedDate}}', 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD')),
    2662,
    {{CODFORNEC_LANCAR_MF.selectedOptionValue}},
    '{{Input_historico.text}}',
    0,
    '1',
    {{mfs_list_lancarwthor.selectedItem.valor_total_produtos}},
    TRUNC(TO_DATE(SUBSTR('{{DatePicker_venc.selectedDate}}', 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD')),
    {{ 
  parseInt(mfs_list_lancarwthor.selectedItem.filial_id, 10)
}},
    1,
    10,
    0,
    0,
    'C',
    TRUNC(TO_DATE(SUBSTR('{{DatePicker1.selectedDate}}', 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD')),
    'F',
    '{{appsmith.store.nome_guerra}}',
    'DIN',
    0,
    3038,
    '{{Input_CHAVEPIX.text}}' || ' ' || '{{mfs_list_lancarwthor.selectedItem.id_solicitacao}}',

    'R',
    4,
    'N',
    TRUNC(TO_DATE(SUBSTR('{{DatePicker1.selectedDate}}', 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD')),
    332,
    0,
    'N',
    '[PCSIS749 - 36.00.05.08]',
    '[PCSIS775 - 36.00.04.39]',
    '41',
    '1',
    '{{CODFORNEC_LANCAR_MF.selectedOptionLabel}}',
    0,
    '00',
    '[PCSIS749 - 36.00.05.08]',
    '[PCSIS775 - 36.00.04.39]',
    '99',
    'N',
    100,
    'N',
    TRUNC(SYSDATE),
	  '{{mfs_list_lancarwthor.selectedItem.id_solicitacao}}'
);
